name: FiPath4Advisors
overview:
Top 10 reasons why advisors are choosing FiPath4Advisors as their top choice for a one source online marketing advantage:

  1. Makes it easier to acquire quality new clients
  2. Receive a steady stream of referrals with our automated referral platform
  3. We guarantee you will receive at least 1 new client with full use of ReferMyAdvisor platform
  4. Expect more, but 1 new client per year = 500+% ROI
  5. Costs less than a cup of coffee per day
  6. Receive a minimum of 6 CE’s by attending Webinars (no additional cost)
  7. 97% of consumers are online – we can help you connect with the right ones
  8. Gain access to industry best practices- across multiple channels
  9. It is easily approved by your compliance department, RP and/or leader
  10. Built by former advisors and senior leaders – for advisors
